item.title: Heather add a quote by Robert Bloch
item.description: "Despite my ghoulish reputation, I really have the heart of a small boy. I keep it in a jar on my desk." -- Robert Bloch

item.title: Heather add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "The beauty of religious mania is that it has the power to explain everything. Once God (or Satan) is accepted as the first cause of everything which happens in the mortal world, nothing is left to chance...logic can be happily tossed out the window." -- Stephen King

item.title: Heather add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "If you don't have time to read, you don't have the time (or the tools) to write. Simple as that." -- Stephen King

item.title: Heather add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Your job isn't to find these ideas but to recognize them when they show up." -- Stephen King

item.title: Heather add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "If you want to be a writer, you must do two things above all others: read a lot and write a lot." -- Stephen King

item.title: Heather add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "I love deadlines. I love the whooshing noise they make as they go by." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Heather add a quote by Johnny Depp
item.description: "I try to stay in a constant state of confusion just because of the expression it leaves on my face." -- Johnny Depp

item.title: Heather add a quote by Johnny Depp
item.description: "If someone were to harm my family or a friend or somebody I love, I would eat them. I might end up in jail for 500 years, but I would eat them." -- Johnny Depp

item.title: Heather add a quote by Quentin Tarantino
item.description: "Carlos: So, what, were they psychos, or... Seth: Did they look like psychos? Is that what they looked like? They were vampires. Psychos do not explode when sunlight hits them, I don't give a fuck how crazy they are! " -- Quentin Tarantino

item.title: Heather add a quote by Robert Rodriguez
item.description: "When given an opportunity, deliver excellence and never quit." -- Robert Rodriguez

item.title: Heather add a quote by Frank Miller
item.description: "She doesn't quite chop his head off. She makes a Pez dispenser out of him." -- Frank Miller

item.title: Heather add a quote by Ray Bradbury
item.description: "You must stay drunk on writing so reality cannot destroy you." -- Ray Bradbury

item.title: Heather add a quote by Ray Bradbury
item.description: "Stuff your eyes with wonder, he said, live as if you'd drop dead in ten seconds. See the world. It's more fantastic than any dream made or paid for in factories." -- Ray Bradbury

item.title: Heather add a quote by Amelia Atwater-Rhodes
item.description: "Life is nothing without a little chaos to make it interesting." -- Amelia Atwater-Rhodes

item.title: Heather add a quote by Amelia Atwater-Rhodes
item.description: "Love is the strongest emotion any creature can feel except for hate, but hate can't hurt you. Love, and trust, and friendship, and all the other emotions humans value so much, are the only emotions that can bring pain. Only love can break a heart into so many pieces. " -- Amelia Atwater-Rhodes

item.title: Heather add a quote by Amelia Atwater-Rhodes
item.description: "I'm standing in a slaughterhouse where the cattle are begging to become hamburgers. I have a right to be jumpy." -- Amelia Atwater-Rhodes

item.title: Heather add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description:
"All that is gold does not glitter, Not all those who wander are lost; The old that is strong does not wither, Deep roots are not reached by the frost.
From the ashes a fire shall be woken, A light from the shadows shall spring; Renewed shall be blade that was broken, The crownless again shall be king." -- J.R.R. Tolkien
